metadata.title: CVE-2023-3509 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before16.7.6, all versions starting from 16.8 before 16.8.3, all versionsstarting from 16.9 before 16.9.1. It was possible for group members withsub-maintainer role to change the title of privately accessible deploy keysassociated with projects in the group.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
